title: We Should Have Special Queue Times for Long Weekends.
body: E.g. All day ranked and TT.

replies.body:
Ranked should be all day every day, we have enough players now to have it up all the time, hell the average queue time at 4-7am for normals is like 2-4 minutes, same for ranked at 12-4, i don't see the need to disable ranked anymore.

Unless its because of the players in challenger who probs have hour queue times but are we really disabling this mode for 200 players in challenger? We have like 100-200k players now don't we? But disabling ranked because of 200 players? Doesn't sound right to me.
